author: Matthew Wakeford
description: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.Special ingredient #1: Lemon sherbetPeel 20 lemons. Juice the lemons, measure the liquid quantity and set aside. Measure 4 parts caster sugar for every 5 parts lemon juice and add to the lemon peels to leave overnight. In the morning, add the lemon juice and stir until the sugar is dissolved. Strain into a clean bottle and keep refrigerated.
name: El Meu Avi
